Command.Name: InsertObject
Command.Description: Inserts the IGameObject with global IGameObject ID GameObjectId at position X,Y.

Parameter.Description: The global object ID of the level object to insert.
Parameter.Name: ID

Parameter.Description: The initial X position of the level object when it is inserted.
Parameter.Name: X

Parameter.Description: The initial Y position of the level object when it is inserted.
Parameter.Name: Y

Command.Name: DeleteObject
Command.Description: Deletes the IGameObject with global IGameObject ID id.

Parameter.Description: The global IGameObject ID of the IGameObject to delete.
Parameter.Name: ID

Command.Name: SetObjectPosition
Command.Description: Sets the position of the object with internal object ID ID to X,Y.

Parameter.Description: The global object ID of the level object to modify the position of.
Parameter.Name: ID

Parameter.Description: The new X position of the object.
Parameter.Name: X

Parameter.Description: The new Y position of the object.
Parameter.Name: Y
